summary: The Department of Veterans Affairs has made few loans under the Native American Direct Loan program, which provides loans to eligible Native American veterans for buying, building, or fixing up homes on certain types of land. title: Native American Veterans: Improvements to VA Management Could Help Increase Mortgage Loan Program Participation
